name: Yakuza 0: The Business Launch Edition
storyline: Yakuza 0 is a prequel set in 1988 to the Yakuza series, taking place before the first game. Fight like hell through Tokyo and Osaka with protagonist Kazuma Kiryu and series regular Goro Majima. Play as Kazuma Kiryu and discover how he finds himself in a world of trouble when a simple debt collection goes wrong and his mark winds up murdered. Then, step into the silver-toed shoes of Goro Majima and explore his “normal” life as the proprietor of a cabaret club.
summary:
Yakuza 0 The Business Launch Edition includes:
- The Game
- A stainless steel business card holder decorated with Kiryu's Dragon tattoo and Majima's "Hanya" tattoo designs
